docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Jan. 15 -- The Foreign Ministry instructed Costa Rica's United Nations delegation today to invite representatives of Canada, Uruguay, Switzerland, the United States, Chile and Belgium to observe the elections here Feb. 2.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, Jan. 15 -- The Foreign Ministry instructed Costa Rica's United Nations delegation today to invite representatives of Canada, Uruguay, Switzerland, the United States, Chile and Belgium to observe the elections here Feb. 2.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 13 -- The Government appears unconcerned about the nation's dark economic outlook and the outcome of this year's national elections.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Jan. 23 -- Porter M. Jarvis, president of Swift  Co., told the annual stockholders meeting today that rising costs would be met by consolidations and improved efficiency in operations and distribution.

docs.snippet: Two New Yorkers returned last week from three and a half months of urging "peace via recreation" in South America. Their tour helped lay the groundwork for national recreation associations in five countries.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 30 -- When the history of this year is written, the economic policies of the Administration at home and abroad, rather than defense policy, are likely to emerge as the central political issues. Unemployment, foreign trade and foreign...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 30 -- When the history of this year is written, the economic policies of the Administration at home and abroad, rather than defense policy, are likely to emerge as the central political issues. Unemployment, foreign trade and foreign aid, are already vying with the missile controversy for the headlines and these are dividing Congress more than anything in the defense picture.
docs.abstract: J Reston on coming battle over bill

headline.main: Cleavage on Trade; A Conclusion That Economic Policies May Become Central Political Issues

byline.original: By JAMES RESTONSpecial to The New York Times
